org.testng
Interface IClass

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ITestClass
All Known Implementing Classes:
TestClass
public interface IClass
extends java.io.Serializable

IClass represents a test class and a collection of its instances.

Author:
Cedric Beust
